ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.managers
Class ThreadManager

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.managers.ThreadManager

public class ThreadManager
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for managing various threads that require to run in the background and communicate with the network. Can set up, launch given tasks, monitor their state, and react to state changes by communicating with the UI. Is a singleton. Created using the tutorial at http://developer.android.com/training/multiple-threads/create-threadpool.html

Author:
Artem Herasymchuk, Artem Chikin

public static void generateInstance(android.content.Context context)
Generates an instance of the ThreadManager if it does not exist.

Parameters:
context - the context

startGetImage

public static GetImageTask startGetImage(java.lang.String id,
                                         android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                                         android.app.ProgressDialog dialog)
Start the get image from elasticSearch task, initialize a task instance and add the appropriate runnable to the thread pool

Parameters:
id - the image id under which the bitmap is stored on es

startGetThreadComments

public static GetThreadCommentsTask startGetThreadComments(ThreadListFragment fragment)
Start the get ThreadComments from elasticSearch task, initialize a task instance and add the appropriate runnable to the thread pool

Parameters:
fragment - the ThreadListFragment that will be displaying the list

startGetComments

public static GetCommentsTask startGetComments(ThreadViewFragment fragment,
                                               int threadIndex)
Start the get comments from elasticSearch task, initialize a task instance and add the appropriate runnable to the thread pool.

Parameters:
fragment - the ThreadViewFragment displaying the ThreadComment
threadIndex - id of the ThreadComment for which to get Comments

startPost

public static PostTask startPost(Comment comment,
                                 java.lang.String title,
                                 GeoLocation location,
                                 android.app.ProgressDialog dialog,
                                 boolean isEdit)
Start the post comment to elasticSearch task, initialize a task instance and add the appropriate runnable to the thread pool

Parameters:
comment - comment object to be posted
title - title of the threadComment, if it is a threadComment. if it is a Comment, not a threadComment, the title field is null
location - the GeoLocation of the post
dialog - a ProgressDialog in the fragment to display task progress

startGetPOI

public static GetPOITask startGetPOI(GeoLocation location,
                                     android.app.ProgressDialog dialog,
                                     org.osmdroid.bonuspack.overlays.Marker marker)
Start the get POI from elasticSearch task, initialize a task instance and add the appropriate runnable to the thread pool

Parameters:
location - the GeoLocation to find the POI from
dialog - a ProgressDialog in a fragment to display task progress
marker - an OSMDroid marker to display POI information

                              int state)
Handles the possible states of the get POI task. Passes the state to the Handler that runs on the UI thread.

Parameters:
task - the get POI task
state - the state

                                   int state)
Handle the possible states of the get comment task. When complete, passes the state to the Handler that runs on the UI thread.

Parameters:
task - the get comments task
state - the state

handlePostState

public void handlePostState(PostTask task,
                            int state)
Handle the possible states of the Post task. Once post is complete, obtains the point of interest of the post. If the post contains an image, start the Image runnable, which posts the attached image to elasticSearch. If not, or after the image is complete, start the update runnable, which updates the commentList on elasticSearch. Passes needed task states to the handler running on the UI thread to do UI updates.

Parameters:
task - the post task
state - the state

Recycles a get comments task for reuse.

Parameters:
task - the task
